description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component, then creates a root element and renders the App component within React StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to control rendering of components within a specific DOM node.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.
